name: Cassie-Ann
description:
Cassie-Ann Story

You wake up at the pier, drowsy and surrounded by bottles. You recognized the doll in front of you. You walk to it, and realizing. you've done this before.

Instructions:

Collect all the Doll pieces(2 Eye buttons,hair,dress, needle,yarn), look in trashcans, around the pier, benches and platforms. Use the Flashlight to defend yourself.

Controls

E - Interaction

Left Click - Flashlight(Uses Battery)/Stitching

Left Click(Hold): Look for item in Trashcan

Right Click(Hold) - Look Behind

Shift - Run (Depletes Stamina)

Ctrl - Crouch

Sit on a bench/ Stand by the light(regenerates stamina or battery)

1-4 Graphic settings from lowest to highest(Apply after you press play)(BUG/ update next week will take care of it)

Hi guys,

Thank you so much for trying the game.  I hope you enjoy it.  I will update weekly.

Much love,

OTGDev&RuttaRazzo

Go to our discord to report bugs(its more convenient to me)

Try our other game! Behind The Grill You want quicker updates and  behind the scenes? Here ya go! Discord Social Media: OTGDev OTGDev Instagram OTGDev Twitter Artist Ruttarazzo RuttaRazzo Twitter Portfolio Ruttarazzo Instagram
